query:
INSERT INTO season_references (
            id,
            season_number,
            series_id,
            library_id,
            tmdb_series_id,
            created_at,
            theme_color
        )
        VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6, $7)
        ON CONFLICT (series_id, season_number) DO UPDATE SET
            tmdb_series_id = EXCLUDED.tmdb_series_id,
            theme_color = EXCLUDED.theme_color,
            updated_at = NOW()
        RETURNING id
